More Bain/LOC photo of NYC Corrections Commissioner Katharine Bement Davis and Deputy Lewis, newly posted:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4798745741/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4786741203/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4787374312/]

(Davis assumed office on January 1, 1914, and the photos show her in action, soon after.)
